title: Do I have to wear Ihram every time I enter Mekkah
transcript: and he's asking about his son whenever he comes from Riyadh visiting them in Mecca must see where his a Haram if he intends to go for Ambra yes if he just wants to visit his parents and stay for a couple of days and pray in the masjid in Mecca and Haram without the intention of making ombres he doesn't have to wear the Haram and he does not have to make his room robbed
